resources.string: The cat (Felis catus) is a domestic species of small carnivorous mammal. It is the only domesticated species in the family Felidae and is often referred to as the domestic cat to distinguish it from the wild members of the family.
Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only astronomical object known to harbor and support life. About 29.2% of Earth\'s surface is land consisting of continents and islands.

Rabbits are small mammals in the family Leporidae (along with the hare) of the order Lagomorpha (along with the pika). Oryctolagus cuniculus includes the European rabbit species and its descendants, the world\'s 305 breeds of domestic rabbit.
